Description: Verify that bookmarks appear at the standard(4) access points

Verify that bookmarks are properly added to bookmarks file and appear
      in all access points.

Add a new bookmark into a specific location within the bookmarks
      hierarchy.
Verify that there are no 'dead' default links.

Determine whether extremely large text blocks can be copied from web
      pages.

Verify that dragging an image across browser windows
      opens the image

Feature: D&D from the desktop â€“ Images
Description:
Confirm that dragging a supported image file
       to the browser window display the file

Determine if the Bookmark Manager properly handles
      items dragged onto it.

Verify that a form fill popup menu is activated
      when a field gets accessed that has been saved in form
      manager data.
Verify that you can save a form's data from the edit menu.

Verify that you can save a form's data from the
      popup dialog box and you click yes.

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content.

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problem "if you
        can't sign on"

Verify that page up and down, in fact, page up and down in
        help

Determine whether Instant Messenger help content displays
        correctly
sort and reverse-sort per column

Verify that browser remembers scroll state when returning to pages
        in SH

Determine that you can right click an image and send it via
        email.

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a
        local hard drive.

Verify that the process to replace a forgotten master password is
      easier/more discoverable (though encrypted information should still be
      lost to the user who has forgotten their password).

Feature: Save username and password, never for this site
Description:
Verify that the browser behaves correctly after selections are made
      in the save password dialog box

Verify that when you disable password manager from the preferences
      panel, you no longer are asked if you would like to save passwords and
      longer get prefilled info on sites

Verify that you can remove a site and username from the passwords
      never saved section of password manager (ivillage.com)

Feature: Preferences, passwords never saved, remove all
Description:
Verify that you can remove all site and username information from the
      passwords never saved section of password manager (ivillage.com)

Verify that you can remove a site and username from the passwords
      never saved section of password manager

Feature: Tasks, passwords never saved, remove all
Description:
Verify that you can remove all site and username information from the
      passwords never saved section of password manager
Print a test page and check to see if it prints properly
Determine if print Preview works correctly
Determine if flash movies play correctly.
Verify that starting a URL bar search triggers the sidebar
Verify that a user can change the search engine
Verify that a search query/results can be bookmarked

Determine whether shift-select gestures for text function
        properly.
Check default width of Sidebar
Retaining non-default size on reopen or new window
Cursors should have the right icon when mousing over
Test the previewing of panels
Verify that nothing changes when you cancel
Verify that changes reflect immediately from Bookmarks Manager
Verify that adding of a panel using javascript works

After viewing a file/page or three, test URL
        autocompletion: test for current browser, new browser and new editor
        windows.

Feature: Local file in new browser window
Description:
Open local files (both HTML and plain text tested) in a new
        Navigator window. Includes tests to dismiss dialog.
Open a nonexistent (bogus) local file.
Access from main menu, keyboard accelerator, access keys.

Use of the native Win32 file picker to navigate through directories
        and open files (html, plaintext, image). Cancellation also tested.

Find using solely whitespace, null, and string with
        prepended/appended whitespace.
Select and copy from the info window.
Verify if themes exist under View menu
Click upper-right (upper left on Mac) to close
Click in the scrollbar area to page up/down.
